label: Pluvial flood due to 100 year event
definition: Pluvial flood due to 100 year event expressed as water depth caused by rainfall of 36 mm/h in a statistical unit, defined by a grouping of homogeneous neighboring building blocks
comment: Pluvial flood due to 100 year event expressed as water depth caused by rainfall of 36 mm/h in a statistical unit, defined by a grouping of homogeneous neighboring building blocks

hasConstraint.label: grouping of homogeneous neighboring building blocks
